title: From an Ugly Peasant Woman to a Carefree Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Family Conflict   Farming   Female Protagonist   Personality Changes   Transmigration
author: Liang Feng Xixi   凉风习习
description: After transmigration, she became an ugly peasant woman who cheated on her husband, stole things, abused her daughter and mistreated her mother-in-law. What should Ye Chunhua do? Easy. Her sister-in-law tried to take her daughter away, that was not gonna happen! Villagers surrounded her house, keep them in awe! When her mother-in-law was being difficult,do something that could moove her. Ye Chunhua decided to farm the lands, raise her kid and have a successful life. At this time, the proud Prince said, 'Do you have me in your future plan? Come, sweetie, let's make a baby tonight...'>
